scenario_text.value: What’re you doing in a place like this, Miu?

Oh, Takuma... Well, I don’t have anything to
prepare, you know?
Sure, I guess Kaito’s taking care of that.

I said I’d do my part, but he wasn’t having
any of it.
I got bored, and it made me start thinking...
So much has happened in this world...

You know, at first I thought you were
a pretty weird kid.

W-well what do you expect?! I was just
excited to be in this place!

I didn’t know how to deal with you, but it
turns out you’re pretty normal after all.
Hrm... That’s kinda embarrassing...

Still, when I saw how you worried about all
the little guys at the amusement park...
I realized what a nice girl you are.

I was their queen, after all...
Of course I was worried about everyone.

There are bad queens out there, too.
You should be proud, you know?
...Thanks, Takuma.
Huh?

For the compliment, I mean. I don’t usually
get any, except from Kaito...
I feel a lot more self-assured.

(I knew Miu was a good kid. She makes me want
to tease her when she’s this honest.)
Miu, you...
Are a good kid.
Prefer me over Kaito?
You’re a good kid.

You’re a good kid. I’m sure you’ll get more
compliments in the future.
Do you think so?
Yeah, definitely.
...Okay. Then I’ll do my best.
Enough to get more compliments from you!
More than with Kaito?

Whose compliments make you happier?
Mine, or Kaito’s?
Wh-what?! How am I supposed to choose?!
Ahahaha, sorry, my bad. It was just a joke.
Sheesh, don’t freak me out.
...You know what, Takuma?
What?

I love my brother, so...I guess Kaito’s
praise makes me happier after all.

I see. You two really are a great brother and
sister.
Yeah... Hee hee.
Hey, Takuma.
...I think Kaito and Renamon are a lot alike.
Kaito and Renamon?

Yeah. Both of them feel strongly about
someone else.

If it was Kaito, he’d work his butt off for
you for decades.

That means Miyuki and I both have people that
care deeply about us.

That’s why I’m sure our voices will reach
her.

Lots of people care for Miyuki. I bet any of
their voices could get through.
You’re right. I’m sure she’ll hear us.

So make sure you keep going until your voice
reaches her, Takuma. I’m sure she’ll respond.

(Miu’s words energize me. I feel like I can
do anything with someone like her around.)
(What should I say to Miu?)
I’ll never give up.
You’re the same, Miu.
I’ll never give up.
I’ll never give up. I’ll save Miyuki.

Yeah! If that’s how you feel, I can’t wait to
help you!

I can do anything with you on my side. Guess
I’m like Kaito that way, huh?

Yeah, you’re just like my brother! C’mon
though, one of him is enough!
You’re the same, Miu.

You’re the same, Miu. It’s not just me. Our
voices will reach her.

Of course they will! I’ll pitch in to save
Miyuki, too!

...I honestly couldn’t stand her when we
first met, you know.
Is that right?

Yeah. She wouldn’t talk to anyone, just
staring into space...

But once I knew we both have people that care
so deeply about us, things changed!

We’ve gotta save her! For the professor,
Renamon...everyone who cares about her!
If we rescue Miyuki...and save this world...
I think I’ll have grown up a bit.
I think you’re pretty great already, Miu.

No, see. I still can’t put my feelings into
words yet.

I want to express my gratitude to Kaito
properly for once.
...He’s lucky to have a sister like you.
That’s not true! I’m still just a brat...

I wanna be the kind of kid that puts his mind
at ease.

Then I’ll be able to say I paid him back for
saving me.

I’m sure Kaito would be happy enough to hear
you say that.

You may be right. Kaito goes gaga when it
comes to me...

(There she goes again. Man, those two really
are a pair.)
(Hmm, what should I say to her?)
He’s a great brother.
You’re a great sister.
He’s a great brother.
He’s a great brother.
...Yeah. I wish I could tell him to his face.
You will one day, I’m sure of it.
You’re a great sister.

You’re a great sister. I can tell how much
you worry about Kaito.
Don’t go taking Kaito’s side!
Stay on my side, okay?!

Yeah, I will. Still...
It’d be nice to have a sister like you.
Oh man, not you too! One brother is enough!

Hey, don’t you have to get ready, Takuma?
Go on, already!

All right, all right! Well, see you later
then, Miu.

(Looks like Miu’s doing fine. I’d better do
my best, too.)
